title: Masa of Echo Park
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual, family friendly atmosphere pizza and Italian food restaurant in the heart of Echo Park. Offers Chicago style deep dish pizza (vegan with Teese Cheese option). Other veg items include veggie sausage panini, veggie chicken panini, veggie pepperoni, vegan & soy cheese, vegan salads, vegan minestrone. All doughs, breads (vegan) baked on-site. See website for its vegan menu. If you adopt a shelter animal and bring in the paperwork you receive 1/2 off your meal.
